name: Broiled Asparagus With Cotija Cheese
description: [Photographs: J. Kenji López-Alt. Video: Vicky Wasik]...
recipeIngredient: 1 pound asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 ounces Cotija cheese, grated or shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat broiler to high. Toss asparagus, oil, and 2/3rds of cheese in a large bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Broil 2-inches from element until tender and well charred, 4 to 8 minutes total, shaking occasionally. Transfer to a bowl, toss with remaining cheese and serve with lime wedges.
